markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Nimble Crawl](/Feats.aspx?ID=5183) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 259 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
Expert in [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1)

</column>

---

You can Crawl incredibly swiftly—up to half your Speed, rather than 5 feet. If you’re a master in Acrobatics, you can Crawl at full Speed, and if you’re legendary, you aren’t offguard while prone.
name: Nimble Crawl

<summary>
Crawl at a faster rate
</summary>
text: <title level="1" right="Feat 2" pfs="Standard" > Nimble Crawl Source Player Core pg. 259 2.0 Prerequisites Expert in Acrobatics --- You can Crawl incredibly swiftly—up to half your Speed, rather than 5 feet. If you’re a master in Acrobatics, you can Crawl at full Speed, and if you’re legendary, you aren’t offguard while prone.
